Reviews.Content: confirmed reservation 10 days advance 7night stay arrived front desk told available night own hotel 2 blocks late traveled 10 hours printed letter backup hotel 12 business travel happened cant rely hotel ok clean comfortable front bar bit cold lonely hotels options eat especially hotel probably ill book time

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: saml0ves2travel
Reviews.Content: booked hotel virgin holidays package partners birthday arrival didnt queue check allocated nice clean dark directly facing brick wall rang reception move special holiday view allocated corner 8th floor bigger brighter dont whatever reason worth move location hotel 15 minutes walk times square resturants expensive staying business tourist fine service hotel soon found eat short walking distance shop nearby called duane reade sells snacks drinks etc starbucks couple minutes walk wouldnt recommend buying hotel shop expensive found irish bar called ten minute walk hotel nice staff feel welcome night live irish music worth visit ate day lunch portions didnt eat rest day prices ate ruth chris steak house night times square highly recommended decide tip leave isnt added onto bill staff hotel happy book arranged cab usual tourist found easy safe travel subway weather nice nice walk hotel location grand central station public library central park fifth ave etc left hotel arranged taxi jfk airport huge private 4x4 type vehicle comfortable cleaner yellow cabs price quoted 55 including tolls tip value definately service able internet service free charge business centre checkin flights overall hotel fantastic location top class service definately consider staying

Reviews.Title: “Fine but could have been better....”
Reviews.Author: robito
Reviews.Content: partner stayed nights stay fine arrived 100 pm ready arrived tv properly clean except chair bed cleaned seat borders time bathroom little liking channels tv various times frustrating concierges helpful recommend restaurant near hotel little cold bored lobby result crowded overall hotel nice improve services smiles staff hotel restaurant

Reviews.Title: “Will never book here again, they make you wait 2+ hours after check in time”
Reviews.Author: mktrip1
Reviews.Content: tiny microwave else reason wait hotel sold day hello hotel sold people confirmed reservations wait 2 hours arriving scheduled checkin times rush ready linens clean stains

Reviews.Title: “I'll stay there again”
Reviews.Author: a_large_farva
Reviews.Content: stayed recently weekend city family location staff wonderful decor clean complaints water pressure wasnt 18th fl towels smelled funny else expected marriott breakfast buffett decent coffee buffett recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything but off the beaten path”
Reviews.Author: lunarluau
Reviews.Content: wife stayed marriott east 34 occassions im frequent traveler york time liked hotel close middle deal irritating tourists heavily touristy quickly doormen job checkin effortless hotel staff talked hotel manager super friendly helpful def stay

Reviews.Title: “Recommended...”
Reviews.Author: PGBakes
Reviews.Content: hotel ny standards heavy gearing towards business location quality size surprised reasonable rates booking advance nice upgraded simply available dont helpful front desk getting coffee replenished bit battle excellent bed slept equipped bathroom

Reviews.Title: “Small, Old and Won't Return”
Reviews.Author: drichrx
Reviews.Content: recommendation friend marriott rewards cheapest service marriotts convenient subway buses gym excellent excellent views concierge average cramped hotel found marriott properties manhattan wont return

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Efficient”
Reviews.Author: nycchic_10
Reviews.Content: recently stayed marriot east stayed nyc hotels means luxurious budget traveller hotel value checkin staff friendly secured low rate reserved awarded 25 gas card arrival checked bags day ready returned offered bring escort upstairs dormitory hear guests hallways looked future visit hotel offers variety options meet travel enjoyed lite breakfast premises hotel food unremarkable former yorker inquired concierge neighborhood suggestions snowing useful menu book informed location convenient grand central un walk cathedral 5th times square easily surrounded hotels choice restaurants expensive meant midtown business expense accounts return york regularly stay marriot east am rush

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, Extremely Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: JenniiFan
Reviews.Content: stay marriott east location perfect convenient subway plus easy walking distance rockefeller center grand central station central park st patricks cathedral etc hotel staff frontdesk housekeeping extremely friendly helpful impecable bed comfortable stayed hotels nyc facility definitely 1 choice

Reviews.Title: “Good Convention Style Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: TPXB
Reviews.Content: time staying marriott typical convention style hotel solid predictable property checkin easy wait elevator size pretty nyc noise looking bar connollys 47th

Reviews.Title: “Small Room, Great Spot, Priced Right”
Reviews.Author: cook7166
Reviews.Content: liked hotel tell maintenance staff upkeep courtyard east overall nicer hotel tho location size expected 2 nice near separate floors otherwise stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: luby9
Reviews.Content: booked hotel virgin holidays package deal couldnt fault hotel allocated 3rd floor 2 double beds requested lcd tv fridge tea coffee facilities hairdryer iron ironing board beds comfy bathroom spotless cleaned towels day stay staff helpful hotel walking distance attractions subway definately recommend stay
